Question & Options:

Options:
A. A) National Geographic sent a correspondent to investigate tiger attacks.
B. B) Two British nationals were killed by a tiger.
C. C) There were several other tiger attacks resulting in deaths.
D. D) All of the above

What roles do Krish Thapar, Corbett National Park, and the tiger play in the context of the tiger attacks?
Options:
A. A) Krish Thapar is a correspondent sent to investigate the tiger attacks.
B. B) Corbett National Park is the location where the tiger attacks occurred.
C. C) The tiger is responsible for the deaths of the British nationals.
D. D) All of the above

Which characters or entities are involved in the events surrounding the tiger attacks in Corbett National Park?
Options:
A. Riya
B. Krish Thapar
C. Corbett National Park

Correct Answer: Riya, Krish Thapar, Corbett National Park, Tiger
